column5: One of the more interesting threads... https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...t=draco&page=1 Breezy Point has now bestowed on me a lasting memorial to this riveting discussion. Framed and ready to be hung proudly in the church of Gord......... I hope Draco is still lurking on WC to appreciate the fruits of his labors...

Oh my, I had forgotten that thread. Thanks for the laugh. Unfortunately I'm also fanatically anti-hereditary aristocracy, so you're on the list to go up against the wall when the revolution comes. Nothing personal, just the way it has to be.
Rumor has it that you have some other special signs around camp.......you ought to share those as well....... PjShorthorn.
